Interface IRfidInventory

All Known Implementing Classes:

public interface IRfidInventory
Interface definition for RFID inventory.

  • Method Details

    • RF_PerformInventoryWithRssiLimitation

      int RF_PerformInventoryWithRssiLimitation(boolean turboMode, boolean enableSelection, boolean ignorePC, int rssiLimitation)
      Performs the inventory operation with RSSI Limitation
      Parameters:
      turboMode - True : Continuous mode(Duty cycle = 0)
      False : Non Continuous mode
      enableSelection - True : Select enable(Set RF_SetSelection API first)
      False : Select disable
      ignorePC - True : The tag data that removed PC field
      False : The tag data that included PC field
      rssiLimitation - : set rssi limitation. If rssi limitation value is '-60', reader only received tag rssi's range from -30 to -60.(rssi range: -80 ~ -30) RSSI limitation setting disappears when 'RF_StopInventory()' is called.
      Returns:
      Success : Constants.RFResult.SUCCESS = 0
      Serial Error : SDConsts.RFResult.OTHER_CMD_RUNNING_ERROR = -4
      Condition Error : SDConsts.RFResult.READER_OR_COM_INTERFACE_STATUS_ERROR = -7
      Command State Error : SDConsts.RFResult.OTHER_CMD_RUNNING_ERROR = -4
      Connected Error : SDConsts.RFResult.SD_NOT_CONNECTED = -5
      * Can receive other error constant of "RFResult" class.

    • RF_PerformInventory

      int RF_PerformInventory(boolean turboMode, boolean enableSelection, boolean ignorePC)
      Performs the inventory operation
      Parameters:
      turboMode - True : Continuous mode(Duty cycle = 0)
      False : Non Continuous mode
      enableSelection - True : Select enable(Set RF_SetSelection API first)
      False : Select disable
      ignorePC - True : The tag data that removed PC field
      False : The tag data that included PC field
      Returns:
      Execution result value.(The detailed values are described in the implementation section.)

    • RF_PerformInventory

      int RF_PerformInventory(boolean turboMode, boolean enableSelection, boolean ignorePC, boolean isEPCDecoder)
      Performs the inventory operation
      Parameters:
      turboMode - True : Continuous mode(Duty cycle = 0)
      False : Non Continuous mode
      enableSelection - True : Select enable(Set RF_SetSelection API first)
      False : Select disable
      ignorePC - True : The tag data that removed PC field
      False : The tag data that included PC field
      isEPCDecoder - True : Set receive data with EPC decoder
      False : Set receive data without EPC decoder
      Returns:
      Execution result value.(The detailed values are described in the implementation section.)

    • RF_PerformInventoryEncoding

      int RF_PerformInventoryEncoding(boolean turboMode, boolean enableSelection, boolean ignorePC)
      Performs the encoding inventory operation
      Parameters:
      turboMode - True : Continuous mode(Duty cycle = 0)
      False : Non Continuous mode
      enableSelection - True : Select enable(Set RF_SetSelection API first)
      False : Select disable
      ignorePC - True : The tag data that removed PC field
      False : The tag data that included PC field
      Returns:
      Success : Constants.RFResult.SUCCESS = 0
      Serial Error : SDConsts.RFResult.OTHER_CMD_RUNNING_ERROR = -4
      Condition Error : SDConsts.RFResult.READER_OR_COM_INTERFACE_STATUS_ERROR = -7
      Command State Error : SDConsts.RFResult.OTHER_CMD_RUNNING_ERROR = -4
      Connected Error : SDConsts.RFResult.SD_NOT_CONNECTED = -5
      Mode Error : SDConsts.RFResult.MODE_ERROR = -6
      Battery Error : SDConsts.RFResult.LOW_BATTERY = -12
      Other Error : SDConsts.RFSelectionFlag.OTHER_ERROR = -1
      * Can receive other error constant of "RFResult" class.

    • RF_StopInventoryEncoding

      int RF_StopInventoryEncoding()
      Stops the encoding inventory operation
      Returns:
      Success : Constants.RFResult.SUCCESS = 0
      Other Error : SDConsts.RFResult.OTHER_ERROR = -1
      Inventory state Error : SDConsts.RFResult.NOT_INVENTORY_STATE = -11
      Inventory stop Error : SDConsts.RFResult.STOP_FAILED_TRY_AGAIN = -17
      * Can receive other error constant of "RFResult" class.
